  • Before we met our heroes

    • Geography

    • Timeline

    • Ancient History

    • The Red Hand of Doom

      Our heroes' predecessors save Elsir Vale from an invasion of goblins and orcs lead by Azarr Kul.

  • Places

  • The story so far

    • Introduction

      How our heroes met and began their adventure.

    • The Race

      Our heroes become celebrities in Brindol.

    • Rescue at Rivenroar

      Our heroes rescue Brindolin hostages from the hobgoblin Sinruth.

    • The Siege of Bordrin's Watch

      Our heroes prevent Tusk's orc horde from bypassing Overlook's mountain forts.

    • The Shadow Rift of Umbraforge

      Our heroes follow Tusk's weapons back to their blackmarket dealer Modra in the Shadowfell, and find new allies and a new enemy in Modra's boss: Sarshan.

    • The Lost Mines of Karak

      Hired by Bram Ironfell, our heroes trek to the distant Karak Lode to recover dwarven treasure, but find a demonic infestation.

    • Den of the Destroyer

      Summoned back to Brindol by a talking magic sword, our heroes stop a cult of gnolls lead by Fangren from completing a dangerous ritual, gain an ally, and release the deva Amyria from the sword.

    • The Temple Between

      Our heroes stop a plot by the githyanki general Zithiruun to infiltrate and then invade Overlook, after they are pulled into a three-way race to recover a dwarven artifact from a temple hidden beneath the city.

    • Beyond the Mottled Tower

      Megan Swiftblade of the Freeriders found intelligence on the Overlook invaders and our heroes go to escort her home, only to find and stop an interplanar incursion lead by Sarshan.

    • Haven of the Bitterglass

      Our heroes follow a githyanki invasion and rescue a besieged contingent of githzerai. They escort the githerzai to a meeting of world powers and broker an alliance against the githyanki named the Gatekeepers. Acting on the Gatekeeper's behalf our heroes unearth a githyanki spy and destroy an artifact aiding the githyanki intelligence efforts.

    • Alliance at Nefelus

      Our heroes join Amyria to rescue the island of Nefelus from Chillreaver, an exarch of Tiamat. After breaking Chillreaver's arctic assault on the tropical nation, they bring the deva mages into the Gatekeepers and recover the Seed of Winter.

    • Throne of the Stone-Skinned King

      The Gatekeepers send our heroes to break the alliance between the formorian warlord Cachlain and the githyanki. In the Feywild they join with a representative of Inzira of the Winter Court to negotiate an alliance between Inzira and Cachlain against the formorian upstart Sangwyr. Our heroes free Cachlain from the magical domination of Virizan, exarch of Tiamat, and gains Cachlain's assistance.
